code:
Screens:
  Screen1:
    Properties:
      LoadingSpinnerColor: =RGBA(56, 96, 178, 1)
    Children:
      - LanguageSwitcher:
          Control: Classic/DropDown@2.3.1
          Properties:
            BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
            ChevronBackground: =RGBA(56, 96, 178, 1)
            ChevronFill: =RGBA(255, 255, 255, 1)
            ChevronHoverBackground: =ColorFade(RGBA(56, 96, 178, 1), -20%)
            ChevronHoverFill: =RGBA(255, 255, 255, 1)
            Font: =Font.'Open Sans'
            HoverFill: =RGBA(186, 202, 226, 1)
            Items: |-
              =[
                  {
                      Id: "en-US",
                      Value: "English"
                  },
                  {
                      Id: "fr-FR",
                      Value: "Fran√ßais"
                  }
              ]
            Items.Value: =Value
            OnChange: =Set(varLanguage,LanguageSwitcher.Selected.Id)
            PressedColor: =RGBA(255, 255, 255, 1)
            PressedFill: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
            SelectionColor: =RGBA(255, 255, 255, 1)
            SelectionFill: =RGBA(56, 96, 178, 1)
            X: =1024
            Y: =16
      - T:
          Control: CanvasComponent
          ComponentName: Translations
          ComponentLibraryUniqueName: new_translationcomponent_2aa33
          Properties:
            Choices: '=ShowColumns([@Choices], Title, TitleFR, Group, ID, IsOther ) '
            Height: =1
            Language: =varLanguage
            LanguageSchema: |-
              =Table(
                  {
                      Code: "en-US",
                      Column: "Title",
                      LongColumn: "Long",
                      ChoiceColumn: "Title"
                  },
                  {
                      Code: "fr-FR",
                      Column: "TitleFR",
                      LongColumn: "LongFR",
                      ChoiceColumn: "TitleFR"
                  }
              )
            Translations: =ShowColumns( Translations_1, Title, TitleFR, Context, Long, LongFR )
            Width: =1
      - Label1:
          Control: Label@2.5.1
          Properties:
            BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
            Font: =Font.'Open Sans'
            FontWeight: =FontWeight.Bold
            Height: =41
            Size: =20
            Text: =T.__("Translation Demo")
            Width: =700
            X: =17
            Y: =16
      - Container1:
          Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
          Variant: AutoLayout
          Properties:
            Height: =689
            LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
            Width: =1366
            Y: =78
          Children:
            - Gallery2:
                Control: Gallery@2.15.0
                Variant: BrowseLayout_Vertical_TwoTextOneImageVariant_ver5.0
                Properties:
                  BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                  FillPortions: =0
                  Items: |-
                    =With({ data: People },Sort(data,Title,SortOrder.Ascending))
                  Width: =400
                Children:
                  - Title2:
                      Control: Label@2.5.1
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1)
                        Color: =RGBA(50, 49, 48, 1)
                        Font: =Font.'Open Sans'
                        FontWeight: =If(varRecord.ID = ThisItem.ID, FontWeight.Semibold, FontWeight.Normal)
                        Height: =26
                        OnSelect: =Select(Parent)
                        PaddingBottom: =0
                        PaddingLeft: =0
                        PaddingRight: =0
                        PaddingTop: =0
                        Size: =14
                        Text: =ThisItem.Title
                        VerticalAlign: =VerticalAlign.Top
                        Width: =322
                        X: =16
                        Y: =14
                  - Subtitle2:
                      Control: Label@2.5.1
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1)
                        Font: =Font.'Open Sans'
                        FontWeight: =If(varRecord.ID = ThisItem.ID, FontWeight.Semibold, FontWeight.Normal)
                        Height: =Self.Size * 1.8
                        OnSelect: =Select(Parent)
                        PaddingBottom: =0
                        PaddingLeft: =0
                        PaddingRight: =0
                        PaddingTop: =0
                        Size: =12
                        Text: =ThisItem.City & ", " & LookUp(T.__Choices("Provinces"),Id = ThisItem.Province.Id).Value
                        VerticalAlign: =VerticalAlign.Top
                        Width: =Title2.Width
                        X: =Title2.X
                        Y: =Title2.Y + Title2.Height
                  - NextArrow2:
                      Control: Classic/Icon@2.5.0
                      Properties:
                        AccessibleLabel: =Self.Tooltip
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 0, 0, 1)
                        Color: =RGBA(166, 166, 166, 1)
                        DisabledBorderColor: =RGBA(56, 56, 56, 1)
                        DisabledColor: =RGBA(119, 119, 119, 1)
                        Height: =50
                        Icon: =Icon.ChevronRight
                        OnSelect: =Select(Parent)
                        PaddingBottom: =16
                        PaddingLeft: =16
                        PaddingRight: =16
                        PaddingTop: =16
                        Tooltip: ="View item details"
                        Width: =50
                        X: =Parent.TemplateWidth - Self.Width - 12
                        Y: =(Parent.TemplateHeight / 2) - (Self.Height / 2)
                  - Separator2:
                      Control: Rectangle@2.3.0
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        Fill: =RGBA(255, 255, 255, 1)
                        Height: =8
                        OnSelect: =Select(Parent)
                        Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth
                        Y: =Parent.TemplateHeight - Self.Height
                  - Rectangle2:
                      Control: Rectangle@2.3.0
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        Fill: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        Height: =Parent.TemplateHeight - Separator2.Height
                        OnSelect: =Select(Parent)
                        Visible: =varRecord.ID = ThisItem.ID
                        Width: =4
                  - TextCanvas1:
                      Control: Text@0.0.50
                      Properties:
                        Height: =27
                        Text: |-
                          =With(
                              {
                                  myTable: [
                                      LookUp(
                                          T.__Choices("Colours"),
                                          Id = ThisItem.FavouriteColour.Id
                                      ),
                                      LookUp(
                                          T.__Choices("Fruit"),
                                          Id = ThisItem.FavouriteFruit.Id
                                      )
                                  ]
                              },
                              Concat(
                                  If(
                                      varLanguage = "fr-FR",
                                      ForAll(
                                          Sequence(CountRows(myTable)),
                                          Last(
                                              FirstN(
                                                  myTable,
                                                  CountRows(myTable) + 1 - Value
                                              )
                                          )
                                      ),
                                      myTable
                                  ),
                                  Value,
                                  " "
                              )
                          )
                        Width: =282
                        X: =16
                        Y: =69
                  - ButtonCanvas7:
                      Control: Button@0.0.44
                      Properties:
                        Appearance: ='ButtonCanvas.Appearance'.Transparent
                        Height: =Parent.TemplateHeight
                        Layout: ='ButtonCanvas.Layout'.IconOnly
                        OnSelect: |
                          =If(
                              varRecord.ID = ThisItem.ID,
                              Set(
                                  varRecord,
                                  Blank()
                              ),
                              Set(
                                  varRecord,
                                  ThisItem
                              )
                          );
                        Width: =Parent.TemplateWidth
            - Container2:
                Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                Variant: AutoLayout
                Properties:
                  LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Vertical
                Children:
                  - Container3:
                      Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                      Variant: AutoLayout
                      Properties:
                        DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                        FillPortions: =0
                        Height: =60
                        LayoutDirection: =LayoutDirection.Horizontal
                        LayoutGap: =5
                        PaddingLeft: =10
                        PaddingRight: =10
                      Children:
                        - ButtonCanvas1:
                            Control: Button@0.0.44
                            Properties:
                              Appearance: ='ButtonCanvas.Appearance'.Secondary
                              Icon: ="Delete"
                              OnSelect: =Set(varConfirmDelete,true)
                              Text: =T.__("Delete")
                              Visible: =And(Not(IsBlank(varRecord)),Not(Or(varFormIsDirty,varConfirmDelete)))
                              Width: =120
                        - Container4:
                            Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                            Variant: ManualLayout
                            Properties:
                              DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                              Height: =1
                              LayoutMinHeight: =1
                              LayoutMinWidth: =1
                        - ButtonCanvas2:
                            Control: Button@0.0.44
                            Properties:
                              Appearance: ='ButtonCanvas.Appearance'.Secondary
                              Icon: ="Dismiss"
                              OnSelect: =Set(varConfirmDelete,false)
                              Text: =T.__("Cancel")
                              Visible: =varConfirmDelete
                              Width: =120
                        - ButtonCanvas3:
                            Control: Button@0.0.44
                            Properties:
                              Icon: ="Delete"
                              OnSelect: |-
                                =Remove(People,Gallery2.Selected);
                                Set(varConfirmDelete,false);
                                Set(varRecord,Blank());
                              Text: =T.__("Confirm")
                              Visible: =varConfirmDelete
                              Width: =120
                        - Container5:
                            Control: GroupContainer@1.3.0
                            Variant: ManualLayout
                            Properties:
                              DropShadow: =DropShadow.None
                              Height: =1
                              LayoutMinHeight: =1
                              LayoutMinWidth: =1
                        - ButtonCanvas4:
                            Control: Button@0.0.44
                            Properties:
                              Appearance: ='ButtonCanvas.Appearance'.Secondary
                              Icon: ="Dismiss"
                              OnSelect: |-
                                =ResetForm(Form1);
                                Set(varFormIsDirty,false);
                                Set(varFormMode,FormMode.Edit);
                              Text: =T.__("Cancel")
                              Visible: =varFormIsDirty
                              Width: =120
                        - ButtonCanvas5:
                            Control: Button@0.0.44
                            Properties:
                              Icon: ="Save"
                              OnSelect: =SubmitForm(Form1)
                              Text: =T.__("Save")
                              Visible: =varFormIsDirty
                              Width: =120
                        - ButtonCanvas6:
                            Control: Button@0.0.44
                            Properties:
                              Icon: ="DocumentAdd"
                              OnSelect: |-
                                =NewForm(Form1);
                                Set(varFormIsDirty,true);
                                Set(varFormMode,FormMode.New);
                              Text: =T.__("Add New")
                              Visible: =Not(Or(varFormIsDirty,varConfirmDelete))
                              Width: =120
                  - Form1:
                      Control: Form@2.4.3
                      Layout: Vertical
                      Properties:
                        BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                        DataSource: =People
                        Item: =varRecord
                        NumberOfColumns: =1
                        OnSuccess: |-
                          =Set(varRecord,Form1.LastSubmit);
                          Set(varFormIsDirty,false);
                          Set(varFormMode,FormMode.Edit);
                        Visible: =Or(varFormMode = FormMode.New, Not(IsBlank(varRecord)))
                      Children:
                        - IntroText:
                            Control: TypedDataCard@1.0.7
                            Variant: TextualView
                            Properties:
                              BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                              Required: =false
                              Width: =966
                              X: =0
                              Y: =0
                            Children:
                              - HtmlText1:
                                  Control: HtmlViewer@2.1.0
                                  Properties:
                                    Font: =Font.'Open Sans'
                                    Height: =Parent.Height
                                    HtmlText: =T.__("intro_text")
                                    Width: =Parent.Width
                        - Title_DataCard1:
                            Control: TypedDataCard@1.0.7
                            Variant: TextualEdit
                            Properties:
                              BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                              DataField: ="Title"
                              Default: =ThisItem.Title
                              DisplayName: =T.__("Name")
                              MaxLength: =DataSourceInfo([@People], DataSourceInfo.MaxLength, Title)
                              Required: =false
                              Update: =DataCardValue1.Value
                              Width: =966
                              WidthFit: =true
                              X: =0
                              Y: =1
                            Children:
                              - DataCardKey1:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: FieldName
                                  Properties:
                                    Height: =22
                                    Text: =Parent.DisplayName
                                    Weight: ='TextCanvas.Weight'.Semibold
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    Wrap: =false
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =10
                              - DataCardValue1:
                                  Control: TextInput@0.0.53
                                  MetadataKey: FieldValue
                                  Properties:
                                    AccessibleLabel: =Parent.DisplayName
                                    DisplayMode: =Parent.DisplayMode
                                    Mode: ="'TextInputCanvas.Mode'.TextInputModeSingleLine"
                                    OnChange: =Set(varFormIsDirty,true)
                                    Required: =Parent.Required
                                    TriggerOutput: ='TextInputCanvas.TriggerOutput'.Keypress
                                    ValidationState: =If(IsBlank(Parent.Error), "None", "Error")
                                    Value: =Parent.Default
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =DataCardKey1.Y + DataCardKey1.Height + 4
                              - ErrorMessage1:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: ErrorMessage
                                  Properties:
                                    Height: =30
                                    Text: =Parent.Error
                                    Visible: =And(!IsBlank(Parent.Error), Parent.DisplayMode=DisplayMode.Edit)
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =DataCardValue1.Y + DataCardValue1.Height
                              - StarVisible1:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: FieldRequired
                                  Properties:
                                    Align: ='TextCanvas.Align'.Center
                                    Height: =30
                                    Text: ="*"
                                    Visible: =And(Parent.Required, Parent.DisplayMode=DisplayMode.Edit)
                                    Width: =30
                                    Y: =DataCardKey1.Y
                        - City_DataCard1:
                            Control: TypedDataCard@1.0.7
                            Variant: TextualEdit
                            Properties:
                              BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                              DataField: ="City"
                              Default: =ThisItem.City
                              DisplayName: =T.__("City")
                              MaxLength: =DataSourceInfo([@People], DataSourceInfo.MaxLength, City)
                              Required: =false
                              Update: =DataCardValue2.Value
                              Width: =966
                              WidthFit: =true
                              X: =0
                              Y: =2
                            Children:
                              - DataCardKey2:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: FieldName
                                  Properties:
                                    Height: =22
                                    Text: =Parent.DisplayName
                                    Weight: ='TextCanvas.Weight'.Semibold
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    Wrap: =false
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =10
                              - DataCardValue2:
                                  Control: TextInput@0.0.53
                                  MetadataKey: FieldValue
                                  Properties:
                                    AccessibleLabel: =Parent.DisplayName
                                    DisplayMode: =Parent.DisplayMode
                                    Mode: ="'TextInputCanvas.Mode'.TextInputModeSingleLine"
                                    OnChange: =Set(varFormIsDirty,true)
                                    Required: =Parent.Required
                                    TriggerOutput: ='TextInputCanvas.TriggerOutput'.Keypress
                                    ValidationState: =If(IsBlank(Parent.Error), "None", "Error")
                                    Value: =Parent.Default
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =DataCardKey2.Y + DataCardKey2.Height + 4
                              - ErrorMessage2:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: ErrorMessage
                                  Properties:
                                    Height: =30
                                    Text: =Parent.Error
                                    Visible: =And(!IsBlank(Parent.Error), Parent.DisplayMode=DisplayMode.Edit)
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =DataCardValue2.Y + DataCardValue2.Height
                              - StarVisible2:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: FieldRequired
                                  Properties:
                                    Align: ='TextCanvas.Align'.Center
                                    Height: =30
                                    Text: ="*"
                                    Visible: =And(Parent.Required, Parent.DisplayMode=DisplayMode.Edit)
                                    Width: =30
                                    Y: =DataCardKey2.Y
                        - Province_DataCard1:
                            Control: TypedDataCard@1.0.7
                            Variant: ComboBoxEdit
                            Properties:
                              BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                              DataField: ="Province"
                              Default: =ThisItem.Province
                              DisplayName: =T.__("Province")
                              Required: =false
                              Update: =DataCardValue3.Selected
                              Width: =966
                              WidthFit: =true
                              X: =0
                              Y: =3
                            Children:
                              - DataCardKey3:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: FieldName
                                  Properties:
                                    Height: =22
                                    Text: =Parent.DisplayName
                                    Weight: ='TextCanvas.Weight'.Semibold
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    Wrap: =false
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =10
                              - DataCardValue3:
                                  Control: ComboBox@0.0.49
                                  MetadataKey: FieldValue
                                  Properties:
                                    AccessibleLabel: =Parent.DisplayName
                                    DefaultSelectedItems: |-
                                      =If(
                                          varFormMode = FormMode.New,
                                          [],
                                          Filter(
                                              T.__Choices("Provinces"),
                                              Id = ThisItem.Province.Id
                                          )
                                      )
                                    DisplayMode: =Parent.DisplayMode
                                    InputTextPlaceholder: =T.__("Find items")
                                    Items: =T.__Choices("Provinces")
                                    OnChange: =Set(varFormIsDirty,true)
                                    Required: =Parent.Required
                                    ValidationState: =If(IsBlank(Parent.Error), "None", "Error")
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =DataCardKey3.Y + DataCardKey3.Height + 4
                              - ErrorMessage3:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: ErrorMessage
                                  Properties:
                                    Height: =30
                                    Text: =Parent.Error
                                    Visible: =And(!IsBlank(Parent.Error), Parent.DisplayMode=DisplayMode.Edit)
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =DataCardValue3.Y + DataCardValue3.Height
                              - StarVisible3:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: FieldRequired
                                  Properties:
                                    Align: ='TextCanvas.Align'.Center
                                    Height: =20
                                    Text: ="*"
                                    Visible: =And(Parent.Required, Parent.DisplayMode=DisplayMode.Edit)
                                    Width: =30
                                    Y: =DataCardKey3.Y
                        - Country_DataCard1:
                            Control: TypedDataCard@1.0.7
                            Variant: ComboBoxEdit
                            Properties:
                              BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                              DataField: ="Country"
                              Default: =ThisItem.Country
                              DisplayName: =T.__("Country")
                              Required: =false
                              Update: =DataCardValue8.Selected
                              Width: =966
                              X: =0
                              Y: =4
                            Children:
                              - DataCardKey8:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: FieldName
                                  Properties:
                                    Height: =22
                                    Text: =Parent.DisplayName
                                    Weight: ='TextCanvas.Weight'.Semibold
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    Wrap: =false
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =10
                              - DataCardValue8:
                                  Control: ComboBox@0.0.49
                                  MetadataKey: FieldValue
                                  Properties:
                                    AccessibleLabel: =Parent.DisplayName
                                    DefaultSelectedItems: |-
                                      =If(
                                          varFormMode = FormMode.New,
                                          [],
                                          Filter(
                                              T.__Choices("Countries"),
                                              Id = ThisItem.Country.Id
                                          )
                                      )
                                    DisplayMode: =Parent.DisplayMode
                                    InputTextPlaceholder: =T.__("Find items")
                                    Items: =T.__Choices("Countries")
                                    Required: =Parent.Required
                                    ValidationState: =If(IsBlank(Parent.Error), "None", "Error")
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =DataCardKey8.Y + DataCardKey8.Height + 4
                              - ErrorMessage8:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: ErrorMessage
                                  Properties:
                                    Height: =30
                                    Text: =Parent.Error
                                    Visible: =And(!IsBlank(Parent.Error), Parent.DisplayMode=DisplayMode.Edit)
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =DataCardValue8.Y + DataCardValue8.Height
                              - StarVisible8:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: FieldRequired
                                  Properties:
                                    Align: ='TextCanvas.Align'.Center
                                    Height: =20
                                    Text: ="*"
                                    Visible: =And(Parent.Required, Parent.DisplayMode=DisplayMode.Edit)
                                    Width: =30
                                    Y: =DataCardKey8.Y
                        - FavouriteFruit_DataCard1:
                            Control: TypedDataCard@1.0.7
                            Variant: ComboBoxEdit
                            Properties:
                              BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                              DataField: ="FavouriteFruit"
                              Default: =ThisItem.FavouriteFruit
                              DisplayName: =T.__("Favourite Fruit")
                              Required: =false
                              Update: =DataCardValue4.Selected
                              Width: =966
                              WidthFit: =true
                              X: =0
                              Y: =5
                            Children:
                              - DataCardKey4:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: FieldName
                                  Properties:
                                    Height: =22
                                    Text: =Parent.DisplayName
                                    Weight: ='TextCanvas.Weight'.Semibold
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    Wrap: =false
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =10
                              - DataCardValue4:
                                  Control: ComboBox@0.0.49
                                  MetadataKey: FieldValue
                                  Properties:
                                    AccessibleLabel: =Parent.DisplayName
                                    DefaultSelectedItems: |-
                                      =If(
                                          varFormMode = FormMode.New,
                                          [],
                                          Filter(
                                              T.__Choices("Fruit"),
                                              Id = ThisItem.FavouriteFruit.Id
                                          )
                                      )
                                    DisplayMode: =Parent.DisplayMode
                                    InputTextPlaceholder: =T.__("Find items")
                                    Items: =T.__Choices("Fruit")
                                    OnChange: =Set(varFormIsDirty,true)
                                    Required: =Parent.Required
                                    ValidationState: =If(IsBlank(Parent.Error), "None", "Error")
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =DataCardKey4.Y + DataCardKey4.Height + 4
                              - ErrorMessage4:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: ErrorMessage
                                  Properties:
                                    Height: =30
                                    Text: =Parent.Error
                                    Visible: =And(!IsBlank(Parent.Error), Parent.DisplayMode=DisplayMode.Edit)
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =DataCardValue4.Y + DataCardValue4.Height
                              - StarVisible4:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: FieldRequired
                                  Properties:
                                    Align: ='TextCanvas.Align'.Center
                                    Height: =20
                                    Text: ="*"
                                    Visible: =And(Parent.Required, Parent.DisplayMode=DisplayMode.Edit)
                                    Width: =30
                                    Y: =DataCardKey4.Y
                        - OtherFruit_DataCard1:
                            Control: TypedDataCard@1.0.7
                            Variant: TextualEdit
                            Properties:
                              BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                              DataField: ="OtherFruit"
                              Default: =ThisItem.OtherFruit
                              DisplayName: =T.__("Other Fruit")
                              MaxLength: =DataSourceInfo([@People], DataSourceInfo.MaxLength, OtherFruit)
                              Required: =false
                              Update: =DataCardValue5.Value
                              Visible: =DataCardValue4.Selected.IsOther
                              Width: =966
                              X: =0
                              Y: =6
                            Children:
                              - DataCardKey5:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: FieldName
                                  Properties:
                                    Height: =22
                                    Text: =Parent.DisplayName
                                    Weight: ='TextCanvas.Weight'.Semibold
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    Wrap: =false
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =10
                              - DataCardValue5:
                                  Control: TextInput@0.0.53
                                  MetadataKey: FieldValue
                                  Properties:
                                    AccessibleLabel: =Parent.DisplayName
                                    DisplayMode: =Parent.DisplayMode
                                    Mode: ="'TextInputCanvas.Mode'.TextInputModeSingleLine"
                                    OnChange: =Set(varFormIsDirty,true)
                                    Required: =Parent.Required
                                    ValidationState: =If(IsBlank(Parent.Error), "None", "Error")
                                    Value: =Parent.Default
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =DataCardKey5.Y + DataCardKey5.Height + 4
                              - ErrorMessage5:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: ErrorMessage
                                  Properties:
                                    Height: =30
                                    Text: =Parent.Error
                                    Visible: =And(!IsBlank(Parent.Error), Parent.DisplayMode=DisplayMode.Edit)
                                    Width: =Parent.Width - 48
                                    X: =24
                                    Y: =DataCardValue5.Y + DataCardValue5.Height
                              - StarVisible5:
                                  Control: Text@0.0.50
                                  MetadataKey: FieldRequired
                                  Properties:
                                    Align: ='TextCanvas.Align'.Center
                                    Height: =30
                                    Text: ="*"
                                    Visible: =And(Parent.Required, Parent.DisplayMode=DisplayMode.Edit)
                                    Width: =30
                                    Y: =DataCardKey5.Y
                        - FavouriteColour_DataCard1:
                            Control: TypedDataCard@1.0.7
                            Variant: ComboBoxEdit
                            Properties:
                              BorderColor: =RGBA(0, 18, 107, 1)
                              DataField: ="FavouriteColour"
                              Default: =ThisItem.FavouriteColour
                              DisplayName: =T.__("Favourite Colour")
                              Required: =false
